The story is just a generic NTR Story with a twist ending. Unfortunate that this could've been a good story about a playboy who fucks around with other girls until she came along and makes him fall for her at the end. The NTR is just a slapstick addition that really ruins the prospect to be a somewhat good and heart warming doujin. But if slapping an NTR stick gets you the buck, I wouldn't blame the author for it.

@Juddeau, technically, all hentai is the same when you get down to it; or just really similar to one another. This happens a lot in media, it isn't exactly  a bad thing, but if you look close enough, you will find that most movies, shows, and games are essentially similar to one another with a few different components and/or happenings here or there. Whatever you like is just preference though, so don't think about it too hard and just go with what you enjoy
